# View ROI & Consent

Views: 

**ROI ( Release of Information)** – Allows the SkilledTradesBC to release information regarding an apprentice to the authorized representative. 

**Consent** – Allows the SkilledTradesBC to release information to the authorized representative and the authorized representative can edit/update the apprentice’s information. 

Navigate to **My Profile** in the SkilledTradesBC portal. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-view_roi_consent_1.jpg)

To view a list of representatives who have an active ROI/ Consent status, select **Active** on the dropdown under **Status**. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-view_roi_consent_2.jpg)

To look for a specific representative, type their name in the **Search Box**. 

![](https://portal.skilledtradesbc.ca/knowledgebase/KB-view_roi_consent_3.jpg)

Keywords: view, ROI & Consent, ROI, Consent, SkilledTradesBC portal, Apprentice, quick guide

### Are you working to be an Apprentice?
